name: Kill Your Darlings
description:
Kill Your Darlings is a horror dating sim made as part of the Aalto Games Now! Game Jam 2019.

Contributors:

  • Elie Abraham (concept, writing, audio)
  • Christina Lassheikki (art, design)
  • Tuure Saloheimo (programming, design)
  • Noora Heiskanen (logo)
  • Rikke Jansen (background art)
